title: I Matched 100% with Six Alphas - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Mecha   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Yaoi
tags: Black Belly   Carefree Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Omegaverse   Proactive Protagonist   Reverse Harem   Stubborn Protagonist
author: Gu Zheng   故筝
description:
Qin Yi was born an omega, but his pheromones could not attract alphas. People in his family laughed at him because of this.

However, he doesn’t care, he would much rather never get married and wait until he’s of age to inherit his mother’s 800 million inheritance and pursue his dream life in show business!

Until the day he turned 18, and he did a pheromone match detection.

After the detection system worked hard for 3 minutes: “The match between you and alpha: General Zhou Yiqing, whose pheromone number is AI6650, is 100%.”

Everyone was shocked. How is that possible?!

Qin Yi: “Is this thing broken?”

The system ran three more times, and the sound said again: “The match between you and alpha: His Royal Highness Halls, is 100%.”

This is the f—ing crown prince of the enemy country!

The system did not stop: “The match between you and alpha: Sir Lu Ji, is 100%.”

This is the f—ing celebrity who has 3.3 billion fans that just changed his career to a pirate captain!

“The match between you and alpha: Sir Zheng Yian, is 100%.”

This is the f—ing diplomat of the Federation!

“The match between you and alpha: Sir Jing, is 100%”

This is the f—ing king of the Kayabi clan!

“The match between you and alpha: Sir Wu Hong, is 100%”

Who the f—?

“…”

“……” Everyone’s jaws were dislocated.

Qin Yi expressed the behavior of slipping away: “…It might really be broken.”

Rule of the Federation: Alpha/Omega pairs with matching rates of 100% must get married immediately.

So the question is…

Qin Yi: “Who must I marry?”

System: “The recommendation is all, together.”>
